document.full_text: world powers, spurred by the nuclear crisis in japan, on tuesday pledged 550 million euros ($780 million) to help build a new containment shell at the site of the 1986 chernobyl accident.
document.title: with an eye to japan, world pledges cash for chernobyl
lines_and_colors: world powers, spurred by the nuclear crisis in japan, on tuesday pledged 550 million euros ($780 million) to help build a new containment shell at the site of the 1986 chernobyl accident.
